name: etag-stream
author: Dan Lynch <pyramation@gmail.com>
description: A Transform stream that calculates Etag/S3 MD5 sum. Uses the same algorithm that S3 uses to calculate the ETag.

scripts.build: makage clean && makage build-ts && makage assets
scripts.build:dev: npm run clean; tsc -p tsconfig.json --declarationMap; tsc -p tsconfig.esm.json; npm run copy
